title: IBM Cloud Container Registry
introduction: Find out about how you can use Container Registry to provide a multi-tenant private image registry that you can use to store and share your container images with users in your IBM Cloud account.

links.title: Managing IAM access for Container Registry
Activity tracking events for Container Registry
Your responsibilities when you are using Container Registry
Frequently asked questions about Container Registry

section_highlights.title: Migrating container images between different namespaces in the same IBM Cloud Container Registry region
section_highlights.description: A common question that is asked is about how to migrate images between namespaces in IBM Cloud Container Registry more easily.

section_highlights.title: Granting access to Container Registry resources
section_highlights.description: Grant access to your resources by configuring Identity and Access Management (IAM) for Container Registry.
